description: This Python source file defines application settings via a data class, functions to load environment variables, parse CORS origins, and a public function to retrieve configured settings. It appears to be part of a backend service configuration module.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: Immutable data class representing application configuration loaded from environment variables.

methods.name: str _get_env(name: str, default: str)
methods.description: Retrieve an environment variable with a default fallback, ensures non-empty value.

methods.name: List[str] _parse_origins(origins_value: str)
methods.description: Parse CORS origins from environment variable, supporting '*' and comma-separated list.

methods.name: Settings get_settings()
methods.description: Public interface to load and return application settings based on environment variables.
